title: Silk Sonic Interview, J-Lo, A-Rod, Storm Warnings and more.
itunes:title: Silk Sonic Interview, J-Lo, A-Rod, Storm Warnings and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog channels his inner Temptations and he even slowed it down just so he could hit that one part. The Chief Love Officer may have a letter that Tommy would be better at answering. Bruno Mars and Anderson Paak are with the crew to discuss their new song "Leave The Door Open" and the album An Evening with Silk Sonic which will be released later on this year. Lebron James is making more power moves. OWNERSHIP!!! A-Rod is on a special damage control tour to save his relationship with Jenny from The Block. There are storms coming to the South and Southeast area of the United States and Steve drops a gem for car owners. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us a heads up about the one and only mission that the enemy has.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
